question: 幽霊
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>secluded</kanji> <kanji>ghost</kanji> is someone who's secluded and a ghost, because everyone's forgotten about him (thus the "ghostness" of him). This thing is a <vocabulary>ghost</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>specter</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
